title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Altimmune Inc

content.text: Altimmune completes a reverse merger with Vaxin Inc, acquiring their technology and pipeline.
Altimmune acquires Spun Assets, a biopharmaceutical company focused on animal health products.
Altimmune announces a 1-for-10 reverse stock split, reducing the number of outstanding shares.
Altimmune receives a $4.7 million grant from the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation to support the development of a single-dose, temperature-stable COVID-19 vaccine candidate.
Altimmune enters into a collaboration agreement with Dynavax Technologies to develop a next-generation COVID-19 vaccine utilizing both companies' technologies.
Altimmune announces a 1-for-5 reverse stock split, further consolidating the outstanding shares.
Altimmune successfully completes a Phase 2 clinical trial for its HepTcell program, showing positive results in the treatment of chronic hepatitis B infection.
